sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Process graph
sect1.para: This page shows the structure of a deployed BPEL process in a tree view.

simplelist.member: To view the properties of an operation click the name link in the listing. This will go to a page showing the properties and their values for the operation.
Click to view the process info page or click the name of the process. This will go to a page showing the state of the process, possible actions for the process and a list of instances.
